title: Tasty Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe
content:
Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe is one of the easiest and tastiest recipes you could ever make with leftover rice.  You are definitely going to love my schezwan fried rice.

Fried rice is not only delicious to eat but it makes a perfect lunch box recipe too.

 

Tips to make the best-fried rice.

1) Always use cooled rice, fridge cold rice is best.

2) Cook rice a day in advance and store in the fridge, This rice is best for fried rice.

3) Always cook fried rice in high heat.

4) Serve fried rice piping hot.

 

I hope you will give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

 

Thai Sausage Fried Rice

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 10 mins

Total time: 20 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Thai

Serves: 2 servings

 

Ingredients

Cooked Rice - 3 cups

Oil - 3 tablespoon

Onion - 1 chopped finely

Garlic - 1 tablespoon chopped finely

Chicken Sausage - 3 chopped

Fish Sauce - 1 teaspoon

Soy Sauce - to taste

White Pepper to taste

Egg - 3

Vinegar - to taste

Spring onion as needed

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pan, add in onion, garlic and saute for a min.

Add in chicken sausage and cook till brown.

Spread it to the side and add in beaten eggs and scramble it well.

Add fish sauce and soy sauce and mix well.

Add in cooked rice and toss well.

Add in pepper and mix well.

Add in vinegar and white pepper and toss well.

Serve it.

recommendations.content:

recommendations.title: Tasty Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious chicken noodles made with a touch of sesame flavor. It tastes so delicious and is so fast to make as well.
 
Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 30 mins
Total time: 40 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
